title: Economic Performance Improvement Strategies Using Digital Learning Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital tools and secondary-level science knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners explore methods to generate economic outcomes using digital learning technologies in science, with participation accessible regardless of socioeconomic background

learning_goals: Learners can understand the principles of Adaptive Learning Technology (ALT) and apply them to economic performance analysis
Learners can enhance their ability to design project-based learning in science fields using a Digital Learning Platform (DLP)
Learners can propose organizational performance improvement strategies through Learning Design Innovation (LDI) strategies
Learners can suggest community economic development plans based on their experience using digital learning tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
